name: Enchanted Nightmare
description:
You play a little girl named Tilda with a pumpkin head who is trapped in a Halloween world. She has to find ingredients and brew a potion to escape this world. 

The game uses the OpenDyslexic font, which is especially readable for people with dyslexia. 

Controls: 

Walk                                                    Searching

                 

Jump                                            Double Jump

Look                                                   Pause Menu

Features: 

Full Controller Support

OpenDyslexic Font

Six Levels

Three Secrets 

Puddle Jumping 

Install: 

1: Download

2:Unpack

3: Start Game

4: Have fun!
